column4: for some reason firefox crashes when I visit www.gsick.com, and only when I visit that site, I've been using that site for a long time and this has been happenng since I upgraded to 11.04, what could it be?
may i ask you when you installed ubuntu 11.04?
ok, does that site use flash or something?
i dont think so, but i cant be sure
try visit without flash, does it still crash?
try disabling javascript, does it still crash?
so it crashes with both flash and javascript disabled? what about disabling images too?
with no results? thats some odd problem you re having, i assume you cleared your cache too?
